title: Rolling Stones - Hampton - 1981
description:
Here is another nice Rolling Stones concert. Check my account for more bootlegs.

Please enjoy, share with friends and please seed :)


The Rolling Stones
Hampton '81
Hampton Road Colliseum, VA, 
December 18th, 1981
Tattoo You Tour
(Keiths Birthday)


PPV Broadcast > ? > Jointrip Motion Pictures > Purchased at Record Show > Copy to HD > Traders Little Helper for MD5 > Gspot for stats

As with all Jointrip productions (at least the ones I've seen) there is a black box around the
actual video giving a 16:9 "look", I see the black box when I watch on my computer but when I 
watch it on my Sony Widescreen TV the box mysteriously is not visible.


Video System: NTSC 29.97
Video Bitrate: 6353
Video Format: 4:3 - 720X480
Audio Codec: LPCM
Running Time: 190 minutes approx.



Disc One

Take The "A" Train
Under My Thumb
When The Whip Comes Down
Let's Spend The Night Together
Shattered
Neighbors
Black Limousine
Just My Imagination
Tenty Flight Rock
Going To a Go-Go
Let Me Go
Time Is On My Side
Beast of Burden
Waiting on a Friend
Let It Bleed

Disc Two

Mick
You Can't Always Get What You Want
Band Intros
Happy Birthday Keith
Little T&A
Tumbling Dice
She's So Cold
Hang Fire
Miss You
Honky Tonk Woman
Brown Sugar
Start Me Up
Jumpin' Jack Flash
Satisfaction
Star-Spangled Banner
Hail Hail Rock N' Roll


The noteriety of this show is that when the band began the encore, "Satisfaction", 
thousands of balloons were released and a fan, taking advantage of the confusion, ran past 
security and onto the stage, directly at Keith Richards, who proved that they don't call 
guitars "Axes" for nothing! The best part is that Keith nails the guy with a Telecaster, 
then puts it back on and keeps playing!


I have seen a couple single disc versions of this, obviously this is the Double DVD version
7804x5203 scan of cover art is in the torrent.


If you have time to download it try and find time to say thanks! It's appreciated
